timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Changed version of `hive.version` to `2.3.7` (was `2.3.2`).
          
          
            
            * Changed version of `hive.version` to `2.3.7` (was `2.3.2`). This allows Circus Train to be used on JDK>=9.
          
      
    
    
  

(let's add an extra bit of detail here so public end users can see what the main benefit of this change is).
timeline.author: massdosage
